group_type.description: The type of group -- A(ctive), M(anual), or I(mplied)

contact_id.description: The contact BYU ID for the device or process

guests.description: Collection of persons who have been delegated access to another person's records

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of guests

guest_net_id.description: The Net ID of the guest

operation.description: The name of the operation in the Guest Access system

device_internal_id.description: The internal ID of the device

visa_type.description: The visa type, validated through the meta/visa_type service

byu_id.description: The generated ID assigned to each identity in BYU-IAM

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of credentials
Hypermedia links for an organization

date_time_inactivated.description: The date/time the group or group membership was de-activated

date_time_granted.description: The date/time when the person was added to the group

created_by_id.description: The BYU ID of the person who performed the creation

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of ethnicities

reports_to_name.description: The name of the supervisor that the person reports to

cell.description: Whether or not the phone is a cell phone

date_time_created.description: The date/time when the entity was created, given in GMT (Greenwich Mean Time)

links.description: Hypermedia links for employee summaries
Hypermedia links for a collection of merge subscribers

related_preferred_first_name.description: The related person's preferred first name

user_name.description: The optional common name or alias of credential_id

email_address_type.description: the type of the email address

updated_by_id.description: The BYU ID of the last person who performed the last update

notify_by_email.description: Indicates that the merge subscriber wishes to be notified by email of a person merge

access_type.description: The type of access being granted -- L(ive), W(eb), or B(oth)

identity_type.description: One of the identity types available through the meta/identity_type service

uuid.description: The UUID (universally unique identifier) assigned to the identity

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of addresses
Hypermedia links for a collection of devices

Hypermedia links for a device

physical_form.description: The physical form of the credential

path_of_executable.description: The path of the executable program for the process

Hypermedia links for government records

related_name_lnf.description: The related person's full name, given last-name-first

ethnicity_code.description: One of the person's ethnicities, validated through the meta/ethnicity service

issuing_location.description: The location where the credential was issued

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of relationships

unlisted.description: Indicates whether or not the person chooses to allow the address to be publicly accessible

date_time_revoked.description: The date/time the delegation was revoked, either by expiration or explicitly by the delegator or guest

links.description: Hypermedia links for a group membership event

web_resource_id.description: Indicates the web resource ID of the Guest Access operation

links.description: Hypermedia links for a merge

related_preferred_name.description: The related person's preferred, derived from the preferred_first_name and preferred_surname

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of organizations

texts_okay.description: Indicates whether the person has given permission to be texted at this number

links.description: Hypermedia links format

country_code.description: The country code, validated through the meta/country service

i20_expiration_date.description: The date the student's I-20 expires

completion_status.description: The completion status of the guest access operation

granted_by_id.description: The BYU ID of the administrator or process that added the person to the group

access_delegation_id.description: The generated uniqueness key assigned to the delegation

delegations.description: Collection of identities that have been delegated access to another identity's records

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of delegations

validation_phrase.description: Phrase used to confirm identity for phone access to FERPA-protected information

tty.description: Specifies whether the phone is tty-enabled

path_of_source.description: The path of the source program of the process

time_code.description: The time-of-day category specifying when the phone number may be called, validated through the meta/time_code service

effective_date.description: The date the permissions become (or became) active

ssn_verification_date.description: The date/time the SSN/ITIN was verified

notes.description: Notes relating to the device or process

date_time_accepted.description: The date/time the delegation invitation was accepted by the guest

inactivated_by_id.description: The BYU ID of the person or process that deactivated the group or group membership

date_time_verified.description: The date/time when the relationship was verified

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of processes

state_code.description: The state/province code, validated through the meta/state service

links.description: Hypermedia links for an address

account_id.description: The account id for the specific credential_type and user_name

status.description: The credential status, validated through the meta/credential_status service

guest_id.description: The BYU ID of the guest in an access_delegation relationship

related_rest_of_name.description: The related person's full name, excluding the surname

group_id.description: The ID created for the group

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of identities

is_adhoc.description: Indicates whether the process is ad hoc or continuing

old_byu_id.description: The BYU ID of the "from" record in an identity merge

email_unlisted.description: Indicates whether or not the email address may be publicly accessible

postal_code.description: The postal code (ZIP code for USA addresses)

expiration_date.description: The date the permissions will expire

active.description: Indicates whether the Guest Access operation is currently in service

responsible_department.description: The name of the department responsible for the organization

relationship_type.description: The relationship of the related identity to the identity, validated through the meta/relationship_type service

new_byu_id.description: The BYU ID of the "to" record in an identity merge

room.description: The room, set only for a BYU office

session_id.description: The session ID of the delegated operaton performed in the Guest Access system

process_type.description: Type of process, validated through the meta/process_type service

device_type.description: The type of device, validated through the meta/device_type service

date_time_updated.description: The most recent date/time updated, given in GMT (Greenwich Mean Time)

device_sub_type.description: The sub-type of device, validated through the meta/device_sub-type service

reports_to_id.description: The BYU ID of the supervisor that the person reports to

organization_type.description: The type of organization, validated through the meta/organization_type service

delegator_id.description: The BYU ID of the delegated in an access delegation relationship

student_status.description: The status of the student, provided by the Student Status Web Service

links.description: Hypermedia links for a collection of phones

related_id.description: The BYU ID of the related person

credential_id.description: The user name or login name

associated_device.description: The type of device, such as a card reader, associated with the credential.  Validated through the meta/credential_device service

building.description: The building code, validated through the meta/building service, set only for a BYU office

automatically_apply.description: Indicates that the merge subscriber has created a process that should be run whenever a merge is initiated

lost_or_stolen.description: Indicates that the card has been lost or stolen

credential_type.description: The credential type, validated through the meta/credential_type service

person_group_event_id.description: A generated uniqueness key for a person_group_event
